title: Dragon's Dogma
synopsis: Based on a world-famous action RPG set in an open world, Dragon's Dogma from Capcom will be brought to life as a Netflix original anime series. The story follows a man's journey seeking revenge on a dragon who stole his heart. On his way, the man is brought back to life as an "Arisen." An action adventure about a man challenged by demons who represent the seven deadly sins of humans.
voices: ['Mizuki, Nana', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Sanpei, Yuuko', 'Sugou, Takayuki', 'Mimori, Suzuko', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki']
staff: [['Sugai, Shinya', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Sunayama, Kurasumi', ['Script']], ['Capcom', ['Original Creator']], ['Nishimura, Iku', ['Character Design']]]
